File /obj/handlers/fairy_godmothers.c

Keep track of all the fairy godmothers. Make sure they don't do any thing naughty. This also controls the costs for the godmother service.

Written by Pinkfish

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/config.h, /include/playerinfo.h, /include/panic.h and /include/cwc.h

do_startup
int do_startup(object panicer)
This method handles a player panicing.

This is the fairy godmother controller for panicing.

When someone panics it calls on this object to help fix them up.

Parameters:
panicer - the person panicing
Returns:
0 if they were unmable to panic, 1 if they were
finish_panic
void finish_panic(object person,
int ok)
Called by the godmother when the person has completed their paniced transaction.

Parameters:
person - the person who paniced
ok - did they complete it ok?
free_godmothers
int free_godmothers()
Check to see if there are any free godmothers. Are you being served?

Returns:
1 if there is a free one, 0 if there is not
query_godmothers
object * query_godmothers()
Return an array of all the godmothers. This is the current set of used godmothers.

Returns:
an array of objects of godmothers
